parameters.name: code
parameters.description: String that represents the internal shipment code

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort the shipments by created_at date

get.summary: Returns all the shipments from the account

patch.summary: Updates one or several properties of a shipment

delete.summary: Deletes a shipment based on its id

post.summary: Links a shipment to a sensor

patch.summary: Updates the status of the sensor linked to the shipment

post.summary: Link a delivery to a sensor

patch.summary: Update the link between a delivery and a sensor

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: String that represents the internal handling unit code

parameters.name: material_code
parameters.description: String that represents the internal material code

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort the shipments by created_at date

get.summary: Returns all the handling units of the account

patch.summary: Updates a handling unit based on its id

delete.summary: Deletes a handling unit based on its UUID

post.summary: Links a handling unit to a sensor

patch.summary: Updates the status of the sensor linked to the handling unit

parameters.name: min_temp_range
parameters.description: Lowest temperature allowed in the temperature range

parameters.name: max_temp_range
parameters.description: Highest temperature allowed in the temperature range

parameters.name: default_allowance
parameters.description: Highest temperature allowed in the temperature range

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort the temperature ranges by created_at date

get.summary: Returns all the temperature ranges from the account
Returns all the temperature ranges from the account

parameters.name: available
parameters.description: Sensor availability. If true, the sensor is available.

parameters.name: location_account_id
parameters.description: UUID of the account where the sensor currently is

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort the shipments by created_at date

get.summary: Returns all the sensors from the account
Returns a sensor based on its id

info.title: Truecold API
info.description: Manage your cold chain logistics data with Truecold API

code.description: String that represents the internal shipment code

owner_id.description: User UUID that will become the owner of the account

city.description: City where the account is located

country.description: Country where the account is located

head_quarter_account_id.description: UUID of the account that will be the head quarter of the current account

is_head_quarter.description: If true, the account will be considered as the head quarter of the company

state.description: State where the account is located.

street.description: Street address where the account is located.

code.description: String that represents the internal shipment code

sensor_id.description: UUID of the sensor that will be linked to the shipment
UUID of the sensor linked to the shipment

status.description: Status of the sensor linked to the shipment, it can be ACTIVE, INACTIVE or STOPPED

sensor_id.description: UUID of the sensor that will be linked to the delivery
UUID of the sensor linked to the delivery

status.description: Status of the sensor linked to the delivery, it can be ACTIVE, INACTIVE or STOPPED

material_code.description: String that represents the internal material code

material_code.description: String that represents the internal material code

delivery_id.description: UUID of the delivery linked to the handling unit

sensor_id.description: UUID of the sensor that will be linked to the handling unit
UUID of the sensor linked to the handling unit

status.description: Status of the sensor linked to the delivery, it can be ACTIVE, INACTIVE or STOPPED

min_temp.description: Lowest temperature allowed in the temperature range

max_temp.description: Highest temperature allowed in the temperature range

default_allowance.description: maximum temperature allowance expressed in minutes
